uk.ac.ebi.ontoapi
Interface Ontology

All Known Implementing Classes:
OlsOntology, OntologyBean
public interface Ontology

Wraps metadata for a whole ontology. E.g. EFO, OBI.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Tomasz Adamusiak, Morris Swertz
